name: 魏暘
objective: This course provides an understanding of the contours of living systems, which is a basic course in biotechnology. It covers topics like life, energy, cellular and molecular biology, biodiversity, genetic information transmission, the evolution of life, and ecology.
schedule:
Weeks 1-2: Introduction to Biology
Weeks 3-5: Cells
Weeks 6-8: Genes
Week 9: Mid-Exam.
Weeks 10-13: Evolution
Weeks 14-17: Ecology
Week 18: Final-Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Class performance/absence/oral report 50%
2. Midterm exam 25%
3. Final exam 25%
materials:
A. Class Handout
B. Referenced Book
Campbell Biology: Concepts & Connections 8th 
(Taylor, Martha R./ Dickey, Jean L./ Simon, Eric J./ Hogan, Kelly/ Reece, Jane B.)
(ISBN: 978-1-292-05780-4) or (ISBN：9780134240688)
